Title: Requires healthcare facilities to maintain a fifty percent operating threshold of certain reusable healthcare protective textiles in their inventory
Summary: Requires healthcare facilities to maintain a fifty percent operating threshold of certain reusable healthcare protective textiles in their inventory unless a reprieve is provided for supply chain issues; provides a fine may be assessed for failure to comply, as determined by the commissioner.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring healthcare facilities to maintain a fifty percent operating threshold of certain reusable healthcare protective textiles in their inventory
